attributes.action: PACK HIS BAGS AND LEAVE NUMBER 10 FOR GOOD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If your fed up of the TOTAL INCOMPETENCE shown by Mr Brown and his Party please sign this petition. 

We can only show our feelings on this matter by making our voices heard

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
